VIII.iii.5.B.1.a
.
Considering SC Based on CBRNE Test Participation
There are no presumptive conditions or disabilities recognized as common to chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear, and explosives (CBRNE) testing.  The determination of whether to award service connection (SC) for a disease or injury claimed as related to participation in CBRNE testing falls under the direct SC provisions.  Decisions to award or deny SC should also consider all exposures the Veteran incurred in all documented toxic exposure risk activity (TERA) participation, to include CBRNE testing.
